name: Basic Pancakes
steps: Step 1: In a bowl, mix 125g of flour and 30g of sugar.
Step 2: In another bowl, beat 1 egg and add 300ml of milk.
Step 3: Combine the wet ingredients with the dry ingredients and stir until smooth.
Step 4: Heat a non-stick pan on medium heat and pour a ladle of batter.
Step 5: Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown.

name: Sugar Cookies
description: Soft and sweet sugar cookies for a treat.
steps: Step 1: Preheat your oven to 175°C (350°F).
Step 2: In a bowl, cream 100g of butter with 100g of sugar until fluffy.
Step 3: Beat in 1 egg and 30ml of milk.
Step 4: Gradually add 200g of flour and mix until combined.
Step 5: Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Step 6: Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden.

name: Fluffy Omelette
description: A simple and fluffy omelette for a quick meal.
steps: Step 1: In a bowl, whisk together 3 eggs and 30ml of milk.
Step 2: Add 1/4 tsp of salt and 1/4 tsp of pepper.
Step 3: Heat a non-stick pan on medium and pour in the egg mixture.
Step 4: Cook until the eggs are set, folding the omelette in half to finish.

name: Milk Cake
description: A soft and moist cake made with milk and flour.
steps: Step 1: Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
Step 2: In a bowl, whisk together 2 eggs and 100g of sugar.
Step 3: Add 200ml of milk and mix well.
Step 4: In another bowl, combine 250g of flour with 1 tsp of baking powder.
Step 5: Gradually add the dry mixture to the wet mixture, stirring until smooth.
Step 6: Pour into a greased pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.

name: Egg and Flour Flatbread
description: A quick flatbread recipe using just eggs and flour.
steps: Step 1: In a mixing bowl, combine 200g of flour and 1/2 tsp of salt.
Step 2: Create a well in the center and add 1 egg and 100ml of water.
Step 3: Mix until a dough forms, then knead for 5 minutes.
Step 4: Roll out into flatbreads and cook on a hot, dry pan until golden.

name: Egg Custard
description: A creamy and smooth custard perfect for dessert.
steps: Step 1: Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F).
Step 2: In a saucepan, heat 500ml of milk until just boiling.
Step 3: In a bowl, whisk together 3 eggs and 50g of sugar.
Step 4: Slowly pour in the hot milk while whisking to temper the eggs.
Step 5: Stir in 1 tsp of vanilla extract.
Step 6: Pour into ramekins and bake in a water bath for 30-35 minutes.

name: French Toast
description: A delicious way to start your day with eggs and bread.
steps: Step 1: In a bowl, whisk together 2 eggs, 70ml of milk, and 10g of sugar.
Step 2: Heat a pan over medium heat and melt a small amount of butter.
Step 3: Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture.
Step 4: Place the coated bread slices into the pan and cook until golden brown on both sides.

name: Crepes
description: Thin pancakes that can be enjoyed with various fillings.
steps: Step 1: In a bowl, whisk together 100g of flour, 2 eggs, and 300ml of milk until smooth.
Step 2: Let the batter rest for 30 minutes.
Step 3: Heat a non-stick skillet and add a small amount of melted butter.
Step 4: Pour a thin layer of batter to cover the bottom of the skillet and cook until edges are golden.
Step 5: Flip and cook the other side until lightly browned.

name: Egg Muffins
description: Quick and easy muffin-style breakfast with eggs.
steps: Step 1: Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F) and grease a muffin tin.
Step 2: In a bowl, whisk together 6 eggs, 50ml of milk, 1/2 tsp of salt, and 1/4 tsp of pepper.
Step 3: Pour the egg mixture evenly into the muffin tin.
Step 4: Bake for 15-20 minutes until set and slightly golden.

name: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
description: Delicious pancakes with chocolate chips for a sweet treat.
steps: Step 1: In a bowl, mix 150g of flour and 30g of sugar.
Step 2: In another bowl, whisk together 1 egg and 250ml of milk.
Step 3: Combine the wet ingredients with the dry ingredients and stir until smooth.
Step 4: Fold in 50g of chocolate chips.
Step 5: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and pour in the batter.
Step 6: Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown.
